text:
I've a short quick project and needs it to be completed asap. here's the complete details:
1- I want to have a multi language variant but HubSpot don't support some of the languages. So, i need someone to customize the default HubSpot language switcher module and add the additional languages

2- Create a blog template in HubSpot (Preferred template:Â <https://www.hubbase.io/blog/HubSpot-operations-hub>

FAQs, Carosul or video gallery, Voice Play function, form at the end

Headers and footers are not required, just the body of the template!

This short term project may lead to a permanent HubSpot developer role.
I would post this in the <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> channel

Hi, we have an "App developer account" and want the scope `crm.schemas.custom.write` but it is not available to add to the apps we run. How can we get this scope? This help guide suggests we need an Enterprise developer account: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/HubSpot-Apps-missing-scope-crm-schemas-custom-write/m-p/678557?profile.language=fr>
Can anyone confirm? And any tips / pitfalls (e.g. modules, cost, dependent on use-case etc)?

I don't have safari nor a device with me I could install it on but tested your website on Browserling using win 10 safari and didn't even want to load I check the console nothing came up either tested the network and just seem to hang on the get request if I loaded using a chrome it worked fine sorry this isn't much help

Hello team! :wave:
I am trying to create an app that connects with HubSpot academy and users can access the courses and see their progress and other things as well related to learning on HubSpot academy. Does HubSpot provides API's for this?
